s: The SellerApp team recommends picking a product that costs anywhere between $15 to $60, with a profit margin of at least 40% (after shipping and Amazon fees). If your product sells for less than $15, your margins won’t be great after the fees are levied by Amazon. If your product is more expensive than $60, customers might prefer to buy from a more established brand...
